name: Prior to 1949,  provided that property acquired after the commencement of the community presumed to be community property.  Applied in 41 H. 578, 590; 246 F.2d 204, 206; see 277 F.2d 806.
text:
PART I.  COMMUNITY PROPERTY ACQUIRED
OR SITUATED IN THE STATE

	  Renumbered as §572-21.  L 1984, c 79, §1.
Note
  Part heading added by L 1973, c 132, §3.
